text: haneul-e issneun geosgwa ttang-e issneungeosgwa taeyang-gwa dalgwa byeoldeulgwa sandeulgwa namuwa dongmuldeulgwa manh-eun salamdeul-i hananimkke buboghayeo gyeongbaeham-eul neohui neun alji moshaneunyo manh-eun salamdeul-i beol-eul badge doeeossnani hananim-ui jeojuleul bad-eun ja eoneu nugudo geuleul myeong-yelobge haji moshanola sillo hananim eun wonhaneun daelo hasinila
